channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023100547
item.description:
Report X-2023100547

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During Preload sort on 09/28/23, a Hazmat package inside delivery vehicle was discovered by driver to be damaged and leaking contents inside vehicle. Driver alerted ops manager who then called QA to inspect package. QA discovered a one gallon jug of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap inside package DescribePack: Bottle of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser leaking contents from loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA placed damaged package in a red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and staged in Hazmat cage on site. Leaking degreaser cleaned with absorbent and neutralizer powder

item.title: Report X-2023100247
item.description:
Report X-2023100247

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-25
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found at the unload area after the outbound shift and there is some spillage on the exterior of the box. Upon opening the package there is one broken glass bottle of ethyl acetate. Kitty litter was used to contain the spillage. DescribePack: The bottom of the package is opened and one glass bottle is broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Kitty litter was used to contain the spillage.
